data.message: Fix Duro MCP config sync conflict (root cause analysis): Root cause: DO server auto-syncing Linux paths to shared GitHub repo. Fix: Added config.json to .gitignore, created config.default.json template. First incident_rca artifact created as proof of concept.
data.task: Fix Duro MCP config sync conflict (root cause analysis)
data.outcome: Root cause: DO server auto-syncing Linux paths to shared GitHub repo. Fix: Added config.json to .gitignore, created config.default.json template. First incident_rca artifact created as proof of concept.
